4305620.name: Brazzante
4305620.description:
Challenge your luck and strategy in this infinite Roguelike Solitaire!

Inspired by the classic mechanics of "Rock, Paper, Scissors," your goal is to survive endless rounds in a world entirely hand-drawn with a unique aesthetic. At the start of your journey, choose one of 5 powerful passive abilities that will define your playstyle until the very end.


Every 10 rounds, the stakes get higher: you must choose between perks and penalties that make the game harder but pave the way for unimaginable power. Collect coins, visit the shop, and purchase permanent upgrades to push further than ever before.


Highlights:

    Infinite Roguelike Loop: Every run presents a brand-new challenge.

    Strategic Progression: Choose passives and modifiers that shift the course of your game.

    Permanent Upgrades: Grow stronger with every attempt to break your own high scores.

    Hand-Drawn Art: A custom aesthetic that provides a light and charming visual experience.
4305620.supported_languages:
英语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
